bill.title: State government.
bill.description: An act to amend Section 17206 of the Business and Professions Code, to amend Section 1936 of the Civil Code, to amend Sections 8879.58, 8879.59, 11270, 11546, 13071, 17581, 17617, 19849, 19851, and 76104.7 of, to amend and repeal Section 5924 of, to amend, repeal, and add Section 51298 of, to add Sections 8169.7, 12531, and 13300.5 to, to add and repeal Section 15849.65 of, to repeal Section 50087 of, and to repeal and amend Section 15849.6 of, the Government Code, to amend Section 11873 of the Insurance Code, to amend Section 62.9 of the Labor Code, to amend Section 972.1 of the Military and Veterans Code, to amend Section 6611 of the Public Contract Code, and to amend Sections 8352.3, 8352.4, 8352.5, 8352.6, and 19533 of, and to repeal Article 6 (commencing with Section 19290) of Chapter 5 of Part 10.2 of Division 2 of, the Revenue and Taxation Code, and to amend Item 7300-001-0001 of Section 2.00 of the Budget Act of 2012, relating to state government, and making an appropriation therefor, to take effect immediately, bill related to the budget.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after March 8.
Withdrawn from committee. (Ayes 24. Noes 14. Page 2916.) Ordered to second reading.
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 23. Noes 10. Page 2975.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET.
Assembly Rule 96 suspended. (Ayes 50. Noes 26. Page 5460.) Withdrawn from committee. Ordered to third reading. Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 50. Noes 28. Page 5474.) Ordered to the Senate.
In Senate. Concurrence in Assembly amendments pending. Assembly amendments concurred in. (Ayes 25. Noes 14. Page 4147.) Ordered to engrossing and enrolling.
Enrolled and presented to the Governor at 5:45 p.m.
Chaptered by Secretary of State. Chapter 32, Statutes of 2012.

votes.desc: Senate 3rd Reading SB1006 Committee on B. & F.R. (Leno)
